title: Not to be a Deviant or anything, but Program Lissandra
body:
It really REALLY reminds me of a certain character in a certain visual novel.
Laplace.
I'm wondering if anyone got the same vibe from the skin splash as I did?
Maybe it's because Laplace is the only "robot" character I liked (no not in that way.) and I don't remember any other robotic people with similar design as Program Lissandra but Laplace.

And no, I'm not asking for Riot to change the splash just because it reminds me of the game, I'm just wondering if maybe the artist had some deep inspirational from Laplace unaware to the artist.

replies.body: Hey Fateborn, I did the concept for Program Lissandra but I haven't heard of this 'certain visual novel' or the character Laplace. Could you tell me what it's called? I'm a huge fan of sci fi particularly that which addresses the subject of Artificial Intelligence. Neuromancer, The Memory of Earth, Terminator, I, Robot, System Shock, The Matrix, Ultron, Demon Seed, Ghost in the Shell, Chappie, Star Trek TNG, Snow Crash,  2001: A Space Odyssey and Do Androids Dream of Electric Sheep to name a few.
Was GLaDOS from Portal an inspiration for Program Lissandra by any chance? Love the skin btw =)
Oh it wouldn't it be cool if she had a GLaDOS-esque voice?

There are a large number of evil AI in fiction that have female voices, SHODAN from System Shock and Red Queen from Resident Evil also come to mind. I agree with you though GLaDOS is an amazing character. Did you ever see a game called PN03? That also had a super clean white sci fi look to it and a bunch of malevolent robots.
This Lissandra skin screams "Transistor" to me, personally :)

I'm just butting in to say how excited and impressed I was to see the skin concept... the Lissandra skin is really creative. Love what you did with her feet ice (the polygons), love the details on her ice claw, and even the claw icon. Awesome. The Soraka one is too, she reminds me of the mechas from Phantasy Star!

Thank you so much for the words and for playing LoL, it was the combined effort of a lot of Rioters who each took what was there and made it even better until it was better than I ever hoped it could be!

I only follow (on Twitter) and converse with KateyKhaos regularly so I've already told her, but the skins have been so good lately, and the splash art too. All involved teams are doing Urgod's work :3
I actually despise mecha and tech stuff, but these skins came out really well. Great job !
Why doesn't Yorick still have a new skin? Go to work, get a money.
Please get informed.
Up for rework, has been said for a year and a half.
Never give up with the kappa...

-sweat loudly-
The certain visual novel isn't meant for most viewers here, however if you insists, the title of the novel is Monster Girl Quest, and the name of the character is as after mentioned, Laplace. ~~Though it's not intended for some of the audience, the story itself is a great one with mixture of SCI-FI, Fantasy, Medieval, as well characterizations.~~ It's a great read and has a famous saying in relative to it to which I would not say here. My deepest apologies.
So that's where touch fluffy tail came from.

Er, yes that'd be one, but the saying I was referring to is more in general.
~~Came for porn stay for plot~~

In all seriousness, I feel like that's how most people's experience with MGQ goes. It starts off as a funny porn game that you're playing because can and it ends up being an extremely emotional experience with fleshed out character development, deep real-world implications, and an amazing soundtrack.

> ~~Came for porn stay for plot~~

Yeah, uh, I read it for the plot... *nervous cough*
OHHHH THATS MY FAVORITE VN... ;D your secrets are safe with me

> [{quoted}](name=Fateborn,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=9mJm6woL,comment-id=00000003,timestamp=2016-03-23T08:27:26.054+0000)
>
> -sweat loudly-

*hands you a slightly damp rag*

The skins, to me, read Code Lyoko meets Portal.

I approve.

OHHHH GOD CODE LYOKO

MEMORIES
